text:
Any Developers here with Expertise in custom integrations using Operations Hub?

Specifically looking for expertise with custom integrations for HubSpot & Billing Platforms (Xero, Quickbooks, etc)

Hi Joe!

We provide custom integrations for HubSpot Operations Hub and we can integrate Xero , Quickbooks or any other application with your HubSpot

our portfolio : -
<https://emeraldsoft.uk/HubSpot-services.php>

Best regards,
Ibrahim

Hi Joe,

I am from Oapps Infotech HubSpot Platinum Partner having expertise with Operations Hub.
<https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/solutions/hub-devs>
We have already integrated Sumoqote, PandaDoc, DocuSign, and dropbox with HubSpot.
